item.title: Heather add a quote by Carl Sandburg
item.description: "I'm an idealist. I don't know where I'm going but I'm on the way." -- Carl Sandburg

item.title: Heather add a quote by Richard Bach
item.description: "Can miles truly separate you from friends... If you want to be with someone you love, aren't you already there?" -- Richard Bach

item.title: Heather add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "The hunger for love is much more difficult to remove than the hunger for bread." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Heather add a quote by John F. Kennedy
item.description: "Forgive your enemies, but never forget their names." -- John F. Kennedy

item.title: Heather add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Forgiveness is the fragrance that the violet sheds on the heel that has crushed it." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Heather add a quote by Henry James
item.description: "Three things in human life are important: the first is to be kind; the second is to be kind; and the third is to be kind." -- Henry James

item.title: Heather add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Most people are other people. Their thoughts are someone else's opinions, their lives a mimicry, their passions a quotation." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Heather add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Heather add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Heather add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Heather add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Be not afraid of greatness. Some are born great, some achieve greatness, and others have greatness thrust upon them." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Heather add a quote by Bessie Anderson Stanley
Heather add a quote by Robert A. Heinlein
item.description: "Women and cats will do as they please, and men and dogs should relax and get used to the idea." -- Robert A. Heinlein

item.title: Heather add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "I have never let my schooling interfere with my education." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Heather add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage." -- Lao Tzu
